title: Almost 80% of Barclays and HSBC customers ‘unaware’ of their bank’s fossil fuel investments
lead: Almost three million customers would ‘very likely consider’ switching to ethical alternatives, according to a new survey

title: Wales sets out plan to become ‘fly-tipping and litter-free’
lead: People are being urged to play their part in eliminating litter and fly-tipping across the country

title: Competition watchdog issues information to help businesses achieve sustainability goals
lead: The CMA believes it is important competition law does not become an ‘unnecessary obstacle’ to sustainable development and businesses are not deterred from taking part in lawful environmental initiatives

title: Green is good, but who trusts it?
lead: A new study finds only a third of EU consumers trust the green credentials of food products

title: Renewables generated more electricity than fossils fuels in 2020
lead: Renewable power provided 42% of Britain’s power, with coal now just 2% of the mix

title: Global solar demand to soar by 30% in 2021
lead: China will account for 35% of global annual solar installations, according to a new report

title: US wind and solar electricity hit new heights
lead: Electrical generation by all renewables has made up 20.7% of the country’s total electrical output in 2020

title: EDF spins floating wind potential of Blyth offshore project
lead: The project is set to be one of the first floating offshore wind farms in English waters

title: Solar goes big down under!
lead: Australia to build world’s ‘biggest’ solar and battery project and export AUD$1 billion worth of electricity

title: 4 Ways to Remove the Headache of a Sustainability Audit
lead: The mere mention of the word audit is usually enough to send sustainability managers into a spin.
